```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)
library(ggpubr)
```

```{r}
aoi_data <- read_delim("data/PET1_adultpilot_AoI_report.txt", na=".", delim="\t")
```
```{r}
ggplot(data = aoi_data, aes(x=condition, y=IA_DWELL_TIME))+
  geom_boxplot(alpha=0.5)+
  facet_grid(experiment~IA_LABEL)+
  ylab("Dwell time")+xlab("Condition")+
  theme_bw()#+
  #stat_compare_means(paired = TRUE, method = "t.test", label.y = 1500 )
```
